DataElement.preferredName: Image Pixel Measures Sequence DICOM Sequence of Items Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identifies the physical characteristics of the pixels of this frame. Only a single Item shall be permitted in this sequence.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Identifies the physical characteristics of the pixels of this frame. Only a single Item shall be permitted in this sequence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Property.preferredDefinition: The smallest resolvable rectangular area of an image, either on a screen or stored in memory. (Free On-Line Dictionary of Computing):Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.:Sequence; serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.

Concepts.definition: The smallest resolvable rectangular area of an image, either on a screen or stored in memory.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/18/13 removed caBIG ACRIN CSI. jc  11/29/10  Removed "manually-curated" from definition; added alt PET question text.  12/31/07 - created for DICOM standard and ACRIN PET Data Elements.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: SQ: Text used to describe named areas of the body as an order set of zero to 'n' values referenced by ordinal position starting with 1 as defined in the 2007 DICOM, Part 5, Paragraph 7.5 Nesting of Data Sets. Size of text may be an Explicit Length or variable Undefined Length.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Sequence; serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.:A group of items of the same type, gathered for display or study.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.
A group of items of the same type, gathered for display or study.

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/20/13 datatype changed to charater to support OCI. jc  2/11/09 released because VD used in NCIA DE to be released.  8/21/07-DICOM SQ value representation type for DICOM which has a variable size

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 11/20/13 versioned CDE and VD to support OCI. jc  11/18/13 removed caBIG ACRIN CSI. jc  12/2/10 added to PET Emissions Scan CRF CSI.  11/29/10 Released as part of CDE used in PET Emission Scan CRF module; added alt PET question text.   12/31/07 - DICOM data element based on PS 3, PIXEL MACRO ATTRIBUTE.
